item.title: News
item.description: OSCAL 1.0.0 Full Release - June 7, 2021 The Foundation for Interoperable and Portable Security Automation is Revealed in NISTâ€™s OSCAL Project - May 19, 2021 OSCAL 1.0.0 Release Candidate 2 (RC2) Released - April 12, 2021 OSCAL 1.0.0 Release Candidate 1 (RC1) Released - December 21, 2020 NIST ready to test approach to make FedRAMP faster, less burdensome - October 8, 2020 OSCAL 1.0.0 Milestone 3 Released - June 3, 2020 OSCAL 1.
